body_html: @jamesr66a, are you interested in adding a mode that does all unrecognized ops as ATen? Similar to what we discussed at #3325 (comment) (see Zach's comment, and my comment below)? If merging this is enough to block you, we haven't hit the magic three, but if there are going to be much more, this might be a good investment.

body: @jamesr66a, are you interested in adding a mode that does all unrecognized ops as ATen? Similar to what we discussed at https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/3325#issuecomment-340216407 (see Zach's comment, and my comment below)? If merging this is enough to block you, we haven't hit the magic three, but if there are going to be much more, this might be a good investment.
